original_text: Because Rehoboam humbled himself, the Lord’s anger turned from him, and he was not totally destroyed. Indeed, there was some good in Judah.
korean_text: 르호보암이 스스로 겸비하였고 유다에 선한 일도 있으므로 여호와께서 노를 돌이키사 다 멸하지 아니하셨더라

sentences.original_text: the Lord's anger turned from him
and he was not totally destroyed
Indeed, there was some good in Judah
